meanings.definition: Causing or experiencing emotional pain or distress.
meanings.sent1: The loss of her favorite toy left the little girl heartsore.
meanings.sent2: She felt heartsore after hearing the sad news about her friend.
meanings.sent3: The heartsore puppy whimpered when left alone in the yard.
meanings.sent4: His heartsore expression spoke volumes about his inner turmoil.
meanings.sent5: The heartsore melody of the song brought tears to her eyes.
